> > LDK is a measurement the Japanese use to determine
> > the type of home.    
> > The L=Living Space, D=Dining Area, K=Kitchen.  The

> > is the actual number of rooms.  If the rooms are a
> > standard 6 Tatami 
> > size then a 4 LDK mansion is a good sized apartment.
